name: MOTHER VEGETABLE Token
description: The MOTHER VEGETABLE PROJECT is an initiative designed to regenerate the Earth and all forms of life through a global network of Mother Vegetable production factories. Inspired by the ancient life form that has existed for 3.5 billion years, these factories use standardized production technology to absorb CO₂ and generate oxygen 24 hours a day, helping purify the atmosphere. Each factory also produces sustainable foods and bioplastics derived from Mother Vegetables, while supporting aquaculture and water purification. The long-term vision is to expand these factories worldwide and develop them into eight related industries—including industrial materials, energy, agriculture, biomass, and FMCG—combining environmental restoration with a scalable and sustainable economic model.
